decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):

P111 Revision P2 (Site Plan as Approval 221307FUL); P111 Revision P4 (Site Plan as Proposed); P112 Revision P2 (Ground Floor Plan as Approval 221307FUL); P112 Revision P4 (Ground Floor Plan as Proposed); P113 Revision P2 (North and West Elevations as Approval 221307FUL); P113 Revision P4 (North and West Elevations as Proposed); P114 P2 (Sections as Approval 221307FUL); P114 Revision P5 (Sections as Proposed); P115 Revision P2 (Roof Plan as Approval 221307FUL); P115 Revision P5 (Roof Plan as Proposed)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow amendments to the rooflights, alterations to the roof, installation of extra rainwater pipes and hoppers, amendments to the entrance canopy and alterations the external wall material treatments, in relation to planning permission reference 221307FUL dated 19/07/2023 for 'Single storey front extension to existing building and increase height to existing roof; reconfiguration of front courtyard'
